mapper.update: UPDATE covi_smart4j.portal SET LayoutID = #{layoutID}, CompanyCode = #{companyCode}, DisplayName = #{portalName}, MultiDisplayName = #{dicPortalName}, PortalType = #{portalType}, ThemeCode = #{themeCode}, SortKey = #{sortKey}, URL = #{url}, Description = #{description}, BizSection= #{bizSection} WHERE PortalID = #{portalID}
mapper.select: SELECT a.SubjectType , a.SubjectCode , a.`View` , IFNULL((CASE a.SubjectType WHEN 'CM' THEN b.MultiDisplayName WHEN 'GR' THEN b.MultiDisplayName WHEN 'UR' THEN c.MultiDisplayName END), '') AS MultiDisplayName , IFNULL((CASE a.SubjectType WHEN 'CM' THEN b.CompanyCode WHEN 'GR' THEN b.CompanyCode WHEN 'UR' THEN d.CompanyCode END),'') AS CompanyCode FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl AS a LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group AS b ON a.SubjectCode = b.GroupCode LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user AS c ON a.SubjectCode = c.UserCode LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup AS d ON c.UserCode = d.UserCode AND d.JobType = 'Origin' WHERE ObjectID = #{portalID} AND ObjectType = 'PT'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl WHERE ObjectID = #{objectID} AND ObjectType = #{objectType} AND SubjectType = #{subjectType} AND SubjectCode = #{subjectCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl(ObjectID,ObjectType,SubjectCode,SubjectType,AclList,`Security`, `Create`, `Delete`, `Modify`, `Execute`, `View`, `Read`, Description, RegisterCode, RegistDate) VALUES (#{objectID},#{objectType}, #{subjectCode}, #{subjectType}, #{aclList}, #{security}, #{create}, #{delete}, #{modify}, #{execute}, #{view}, #{read}, #{description}, #{registerCode},now(3));
mapper.update: UPDATE covi_smart4j.portal AS b SET b.IsUse = (SELECT * FROM (SELECT (CASE a.IsUse WHEN 'Y' THEN 'N' WHEN 'N' THEN 'Y' END) FROM Portal AS a WHERE a.PortalID = #{portalID}) AS temp ) WHERE b.PortalID = #{portalID}
